verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa kahena--brahmā, tomāra pitā nārāyaṇa
āmi gopa, tumi kaiche āmāra nandana

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kahena—says; brahmā—O Lord Brahmā; tomāra—your; pitā—father; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; āmi—I (am); gopa—cowherd boy; tumi—you; kaiche—how; āmāra—My; nandana—son.
translation: Śrī Kṛṣṇa said, "O Brahmā, your father is Nārāyaṇa. I am but a cowherd boy. How can you be My son?"
